channel.title: Benson Fan
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Machine Learning Model - Squat Recognition
item.description: Users perform a squat in front of a webcam and the web application will correct improper exercise form - This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a secondary...

item.title: Agar Remake
item.description: A remake of agar.io which is a web game that features a multiplayer, player vs player Pacman-esque gameplay - Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who...
